title: MIACME experimental setup schema
description: JSON-schema representing the experimental setup in a cell migration experiment.

basicApproach.description: A description of the study type or approach used, such as in vitro, in vivo, in silico.

cellModel.description: A description of the cells used in the experiment.

assayType.description: The type of assay. For example: single-cell migration, developmental assay, immune response, chemotaxic, microfluidic, wound-healing, spheroid

interference.description: Representing the interference or perturbation in the experiment. For example: RNAi, gene construct, chemicals, serum, substrate, stiffness, specific protein

microenvironmentSubstrate.description: The microenvironment for in vitro experiments, description of the substrate. For example: glass, plastic, ECM, gel or collagen, fibronectin

microenvironmentTissue.description: The microenvironment for in vivo experiments, description of the tissue. For example: mouse, dermis, Zebrafish, embryo.
